dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
Tomli is a Python library for parsing TOML. Tomli is fully compatible
with TOML v1.0.0.
dependencies.name: py-tomli

dependencies.description: virtualenv is a tool to create isolated Python environments.
dependencies.name: py-virtualenv

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
LAMMPS stands for Large-scale Atomic/Molecular Massively Parallel
Simulator.
dependent_to.name: lammps

dependent_to.description: Python library for calculating contours of 2D quadrilateral grids.
dependent_to.name: py-contourpy

dependent_to.description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Service provides a user
interface for accessing hardware telemetry and settings securely.
dependent_to.name: py-geopmdpy

dependent_to.description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Service provides a user
interface for accessing hardware telemetry and settings securely.
dependent_to.name: py-geopmpy

dependent_to.description: Cloud-native genomic dataframes and batch computing (Python API)
dependent_to.name: py-hail

dependent_to.description:
XLA library for Jax. jaxlib is the support library for JAX. While JAX
itself is a pure Python package, jaxlib contains the binary (C/C++)
parts of the library, including Python bindings, the XLA compiler, the
PJRT runtime, and a handful of handwritten kernels.
dependent_to.name: py-jaxlib

dependent_to.description: Python dependency management and packaging made easy.
dependent_to.name: py-poetry

dependent_to.description:
scikit-build-core is a doubly improved build system generator for
CPython C/C++/Fortran/Cython extensions. It features several
improvements over the classic scikit-build build system generator.
dependent_to.name: py-scikit-build-core

dependent_to.description:
A quick single file library for easily adding evaluatable expressions
into python projects.
dependent_to.name: py-simpleeval

dependent_to.description:
WAVES (LANL code C23004) is a computational science and engineering
workflow tool that integrates parametric studies with traditional
software build systems.
dependent_to.name: py-waves

description: A simple, correct PEP517 package builder.
name: py-build
